# datenguideR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/Projects)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=Projects)
<!-- badges: end -->


## Usage

First, install package from GitHub:

```{r, eval = F}
devtools::install_github("CorrelAid/datenguideR", ref = "dev")
```


Load package:

```{r}
library(datenguideR)
```



## Examples

Show overview of all available variables:

```{r}
datenguideR::dg_descriptions %>%
  dplyr::sample_n(10) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```

Pick a variable and put it into `dg_call`.

For example:

+ *AI0202*: Bev√∂lkerungsentwicklung im Jahr je 10.000 Einw.


```{r}
dg_call(variable = "AI0202", year = 1990:2018, regions = "11")
```
